paper_abstract: A measure to evaluate functional dependency of crisp system Output on crisp system input(S) proposed by Pawlak in the context of rough set theory, has been extended to the fuzzy input-output case by using fuzzy-rough hybrids. We have shown that the proposed measure covers Pawlak's measure as a limiting case. (c) 2005 Published by Elsevier B.V.
paper_title: On the extension of functional dependency degree from crisp to fuzzy partitions
